message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.NI 

The paper discusses security issues in virtualization technology and its application to the Cloud setting. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the evolution of virtualization technology and its application to the Cloud, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). Additionally, the paper discusses control and monitoring of Virtual Machine activity, which could place it in cs.SE (Software Engineering) or cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper discusses hardware virtualization protection/isolation, which could place it in cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture).
